verses.name: Genesis 41:45
verses.text: And Pharaoh called Joseph’s name Zaphnath–paaneah; and he gave him to wife Asenath the daughter of Poti–pherah priest of On. And Joseph went out over all the land of Egypt.

verses.name: Genesis 41:46
verses.text: And Joseph was thirty years old when he stood before Pharaoh king of Egypt. And Joseph went out from the presence of Pharaoh, and went throughout all the land of Egypt.

verses.name: Genesis 41:47
verses.text: And in the seven plenteous years the earth brought forth by handfuls.
